title: Auditable Radiology AI
alt: Diagram of the hierarchical deep learning model for radiology report generation and auditing.
description: Developed an end-to-end deep learning system that generates radiology reports from chest X-rays. To ensure clinical trust, I engineered a novel dual-audit framework that validates reports for logical consistency and fairness across rare diseases, mitigating the risk of 'plausible nonsense' common in generative models. The system achieves 0.94 ROC-AUC for clinical predictions and 100% logical consistency, demonstrating a reliable foundation for augmenting clinical workflows.

title: Cold-Start Recommender
alt: 3D plot showing clusters of movie embeddings learned by the recommendation model.
description: Engineered a multimodal recommendation system that solves the critical 'cold-start' problem by creating dynamic user taste profiles from both visual and textual data. Implemented a production-oriented two-stage (retrieval-then-rank) pipeline using FAISS, reducing the ranking model's computational load by 95%. The system is designed to increase long-term user retention by balancing relevance with content diversity, improving content discovery.

title: IdeaGenie AI Assistant
alt: Screenshot of the IdeaGenie React dashboard showing prioritized innovation ideas.
description: Developed a full-stack AI decision assistant that automates the prioritization of innovation ideas, mitigating the financial risk of misallocating R&D resources. Engineered a ReAct-style LLM agent that uses company-specific data (RAG) to provide data-grounded, explainable recommendations. The tool's robust analytical engine and intuitive React UI earned 2nd Place at the Luddy Hackathon, demonstrating a proven ability to deliver user-centric and technically sophisticated AI solutions.

title: Ape Pose Estimation
alt: Qualitative comparison of ape pose estimation results from the research paper.
description: Co-authored a research report benchmarking CNNs against Vision Transformers for the challenging task of multi-ape pose estimation. My contributions included initial research and final report synthesis. We proved that transformer models, when combined with heatmap-based supervision instead of direct coordinate regression, achieve over 93% PCK@0.2 accuracy. This work provides a foundation for developing scalable, non-invasive tools to track animal behavior for conservation and ethology research.

title: GenAI Business Toolkit
alt: Diagram showing two business automation flows: one for classification and one for RAG-based Q&A.
description: Designed a toolkit of GenAI solutions to automate business processes for customer service teams. This project demonstrates selecting the optimal AI architecture by implementing a zero-shot classifier for efficient complaint routing ('many-to-few') and a separate RAG-based chatbot for accurate FAQ retrieval ('many-to-many'). This highlights the strategic trade-off between a simple LLM call and a full RAG pipeline to build cost-effective, fit-for-purpose AI solutions.
